-- Hydras --

Megatron's thoughts flash mild irritation as Galvatron explains the 
situation with Cyngar. "Yes, we definately need to rid ourselves of 
him... I think it might be a good idea to attack soon... With the 
Tripreds still wounded, we'd have a good chance..." 

"I'm worried about the ever so silent Maximals," Megatron 
continues, "We haven't heard anything from them in a while, and it 
bothers me."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Hyrdas lands outside his base. He turns back to the troops not far 
behind 
> him. "No doubt Cyngar will seak shelter with Empath.  I would 
guess 
> Galvatron's base would be the logical place for them to go but I 
know that 
> bases defenses and we arent ready to launch an assault on them 
with the 
> tripred around. Let us go in and plan our next move. I will also 
have to pick 
> a new second in command now that our troops are combined. Whoever 
desires the 
> position and feels can handel it make me know it. Just leave ur 
name infront 
> of my quarters door." He walked into the base and transformed into 
beast mode 
> and  locked his quarters. "Megatron we need to talk about the 
future. Cyngar 
> knows to many secrets of mine we need to eliminate him. If we do 
the tripred 
> may attack us or join forces with Cyngar..also who do you think 
would be a 
> fittign second in command?"
> 
>  Proto collapsed ina  chair on the bridge from pure lack of 
energy. 
> Destructor and Quilldart stared eachother down. "We are on the 
same tream now 
> galvatronian dont get any funny ideas" Quilldart stared a hole 
into his face. 
> "I follow Galva's spark till the end...no one elses" He turned and 
walked 
> down the hall.
